wikipedia_page.main: Tyrell Belford (born 6 May 1994 in Nuneaton), is an English semi-professional footballer who currently plays for Stafford Rangers as well as being a full-time goalkeeping coach.

response: He is the son of Tamworth kitman Buster Belford and the father of professional goalkeepers Cameron Belford and Tyrell Belford. His cousins are Stafford Rangers striker Kyle Perry and Bilston Town defender Todd Perry. Belford's maternal grandfather, Bill Scattergood also played for Nuneaton Borough, between 1947 and 1952.
He is the son of Tamworth goalkeeper Dale Belford and the brother of former Swindon Town goalkeeper Tyrell Belford.
*26 June 2014: The Swindon Advertiser report that Tyrell Belford has been made available for loan.
